pageTitle: Best Price on Morrow Kava Snowboard - Women's
textBeforeTable: Twin tip flex is consistent riding switch or standard Biaxial glass is torsionally stronger and more stable Full-length Elevated Core for a smooth, responsive ride Aggressive Radial sidecut for quicker, more powerful turns Die-cut base for durability, speed and performance 360degrees Edge protection, the strongest edge around SPT sidewall for unmatched performance and a smoother ride Twin tip shape for freestyle or freeride performance NEW! Morr-Rock Rocker profile for ease in landing tricks Key Features of the Morrow Kava Snowboard: The Morrow Kava is our top level women's board. The Kava features a screenprint base and a 100% wood Elevated Core for a smooth, responsive ride. Morr-Rock Rocker makes it easier to land tricks and prevents edge-catch. The Kava is made for women who want top performance in a stylish package. Product Features
